title: Troubleshoot Crusher Blockage
description: A primary gyratory crusher suddenly stops, and a control room operator must diagnose the problem.

tasks.expected_outcome: The alarm is acknowledged in the control system.

tasks.description: Review the sequence of events in the alarm log leading up to the stoppage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The log shows a 'motor overload' alarm occurred just before the shutdown, suggesting a blockage.

tasks.description: Dispatch a field operator to visually inspect the crusher chamber for a blockage (e.g., a large rock or piece of metal).
tasks.expected_outcome: A field operator is dispatched to safely inspect the crusher.
